p: The amounts of phenolic and flavonoid compounds in the R. graveolens extract were 14.1 ± 0.47 mg GAE/g of the dry extracts and 15.8 ± 0.19 mg rutin equivalent/g of the dry extract, respectively. The obtained inhibitory activity of the R. graveolens extract in DPPH radicals (IC 50) was 159.17 ± 1.56 μg/mL.
